name: Crash Bandicoot Mobile
description: A new kind of Crash adventure featuring your favorite characters. Crash & Coco team up to put a stop to Dr Neo Cortex’s evil plan to destroy the multiverse! In this new mobile episode, Dr Neo Cortex has dispatched mutagen henchmen across the multiverse to enslave all dimensions. With the help of his sister Coco, Crash must bash Cortex’s minions back to their own dimensions!
